resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106155</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106155</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Human Rights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschliche Rechte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Droits de l'homme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Direitas Humanas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diritti dell'uomo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Derechos Humanos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of downloadable video clips on the theme of Human Rights, with guiding questions for students. Clips are drawn from the following PBS WIDE ANGLE documentaries: "Greetings from Grozny" (2002), "Time for School" (2003).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung downloadable videoclips auf dem 
Thema der menschlichen Rechte, mit leitenden Fragen für 
Kursteilnehmer. Clips werden von den folgenden PBS 
Weitwinkeldokumentarfilmen gezeichnet: "Grüße von Grozny" 
(2002), "Zeit für Schule" (2003).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de clips visuels downloadable sur le
thème des droits de l'homme, avec des questions de guidage pour des 
étudiants. Des clips sont tirés des documentaires 
GRANDS-ANGULAIRES suivants de PBS : "salutations de Grozni" 
(2002), "heure pour l'école" (2003).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de grampos video downloadable no tema
de direitas humanas, com perguntas guiando para estudantes. Os 
grampos são desenhados dos seguintes documentaries LARGOS do ÂNGULO 
de PBS: "cumprimentos de Grozny" (2002), "hora para a escola" 
(2003).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di video clip downloadable sul tema 
dei diritti dell'uomo, con le domande guidanti per gli allievi. 
Le clip sono estratte dai seguenti documentaries GRANDANGOLARI 
di PBS: "saluti da Groznyi" (2002), "tempo per la scuola" 
(2003).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των τηλεκατεγραφόμενων τηλεοπτικών 
συνδετήρων στο θέμα των ανθρώπινων δικαιωμάτων, με την καθοδήγηση
των ερωτήσεων για τους σπουδαστές. Οι συνδετήρες προέρχονται
από τα ακόλουθα ντοκιμαντέρ PBS WIDE.ANGLE: 
"Χαιρετισμοί από το Γκρόζνυ" (2002), "χρόνος για το 
σχολείο" (2003).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de clips video downloadable en el 
tema de derechos humanos, con las preguntas de guía para los 
estudiantes. Los clips se trazan de los documentaries 
GRANANGULARES siguientes de PBS: "saludos de Grozny" (2002), 
"hora para la escuela" (2003).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106155</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/human-rights</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
